languages.text: "Так ты чтишь гостеприимство Комморры, Аребенниан?" {n}Архонт раздраженно сжимает руку в кулак и тень его нависает над эльдаром, словно грозовая туча.{/n} "Я думал, что твое слово стоит дороже. Ты оскорбляешь меня, вновь вмешиваясь в ход суда".

traits.locale_text: "Так ты чтишь гостеприимство Комморры, Аребенниан?" {n}Архонт раздраженно сжимает руку в кулак и тень его нависает над эльдаром, словно грозовая туча.{/n} "Я думал, что твое слово стоит дороже. Ты оскорбляешь меня, вновь вмешиваясь в ход суда".
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "Is this how you treat the hospitality of Commorragh, Arebennian?" {n}The Archon angrily balls his fist, the shadow of his wrath hanging over the Aeldari interloper like a thunder cloud.{/n} "I thought your words were worth more. You insult me by interrupting the trial again."
languages.original_text: "Так ты чтишь гостеприимство Комморры, Аребенниан?" {n}Архонт раздраженно сжимает руку в кулак и тень его нависает над эльдаром, словно грозовая туча.{/n} "Я думал, что твое слово стоит дороже. Ты оскорбляешь меня, вновь вмешиваясь в ход суда".

traits.locale_text: "Is this how you treat the hospitality of Commorragh, Arebennian?" {n}The Archon angrily balls his fist, the shadow of his wrath hanging over the Aeldari interloper like a thunder cloud.{/n} "I thought your words were worth more. You insult me by interrupting the trial again."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: “科摩罗如此好客地接待你，你就是这么回应我们的吗，独角？”{n}执政官愤怒地捏紧了拳头，他愤怒的吼声仿佛雷云一样，笼罩在这位不请自来的艾达灵族身上。{/n}“我本以为你的话会更有价值。你再次打断了审判，这是对我的侮辱。”
languages.original_text: "Is this how you treat the hospitality of Commorragh, Arebennian?" {n}The Archon angrily balls his fist, the shadow of his wrath hanging over the Aeldari interloper like a thunder cloud.{/n} "I thought your words were worth more. You insult me by interrupting the trial again."

traits.locale_text: “科摩罗如此好客地接待你，你就是这么回应我们的吗，独角？”{n}执政官愤怒地捏紧了拳头，他愤怒的吼声仿佛雷云一样，笼罩在这位不请自来的艾达灵族身上。{/n}“我本以为你的话会更有价值。你再次打断了审判，这是对我的侮辱。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: 「これがコモラフのもてなしか、アーベニアン？{n}アーコンは怒りに震えながら拳を握り、憤怒の影が雷雲のようにアエルダリの邪魔者に向けられた。{/n}「何を言っても無駄だ。また裁判を中断して私を侮辱するつもりか」
languages.original_text: "Is this how you treat the hospitality of Commorragh, Arebennian?" {n}The Archon angrily balls his fist, the shadow of his wrath hanging over the Aeldari interloper like a thunder cloud.{/n} "I thought your words were worth more. You insult me by interrupting the trial again."

traits.locale_text: 「これがコモラフのもてなしか、アーベニアン？{n}アーコンは怒りに震えながら拳を握り、憤怒の影が雷雲のようにアエルダリの邪魔者に向けられた。{/n}「何を言っても無駄だ。また裁判を中断して私を侮辱するつもりか」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: «¿Así correspondes la hospitalidad de Commorragh, Arebennian?». {n}El Arconte furioso cierra el puño y la sombra de su ira se extiende sobre el Aeldari entrometido como una nube de tormenta.{/n} «Pensé que tus palabras tenían más valor. Me insultas al interrumpir otra vez el juicio».
languages.original_text: "Is this how you treat the hospitality of Commorragh, Arebennian?" {n}The Archon angrily balls his fist, the shadow of his wrath hanging over the Aeldari interloper like a thunder cloud.{/n} "I thought your words were worth more. You insult me by interrupting the trial again."

traits.locale_text: «¿Así correspondes la hospitalidad de Commorragh, Arebennian?». {n}El Arconte furioso cierra el puño y la sombra de su ira se extiende sobre el Aeldari entrometido como una nube de tormenta.{/n} «Pensé que tus palabras tenían más valor. Me insultas al interrumpir otra vez el juicio».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: « Est-ce ainsi que vous montrez votre reconnaissance envers l'hospitalité de Commorragh, Arebennian ? » {n}L'ombre de la fureur de l'archonte, qui serre les poings de colère, semble flotter au-dessus de l'Aeldari comme un nuage orageux prêt à exploser.{/n} « Je croyais que votre parole avait plus de valeur. Vous m'insultez en interrompant de nouveau ce procès. »
languages.original_text: "Is this how you treat the hospitality of Commorragh, Arebennian?" {n}The Archon angrily balls his fist, the shadow of his wrath hanging over the Aeldari interloper like a thunder cloud.{/n} "I thought your words were worth more. You insult me by interrupting the trial again."

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce ainsi que vous montrez votre reconnaissance envers l'hospitalité de Commorragh, arebennian ? » {n}L'ombre de la fureur de l'archonte, qui serre les poings de colère, semble flotter au-dessus de l'Aeldari comme un nuage orageux prêt à exploser.{/n} « Je croyais que votre parole avait plus de valeur. Vous m'insultez en interrompant de nouveau ce procès. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "Würdigt Ihr so die Gastfreundschaft von Commorragh, Arebennian?" {n}Der Archon ballt wütend seine Faust, der Schatten seines Zorns hängt über dem Aeldari-Störenfried wie eine Gewitterwolke.{/n} "Ich hatte gedacht, Eure Worte wären mehr wert. Es ist eine Beleidigung, dass Ihr den Prozess erneut unterbrecht."
languages.original_text: "Is this how you treat the hospitality of Commorragh, Arebennian?" {n}The Archon angrily balls his fist, the shadow of his wrath hanging over the Aeldari interloper like a thunder cloud.{/n} "I thought your words were worth more. You insult me by interrupting the trial again."

traits.locale_text: "Würdigt Ihr so die Gastfreundschaft von Commorragh, Arebennian?" {n}Der Archon ballt wütend seine Faust, der Schatten seines Zorns hängt über dem Aeldari-Störenfried wie eine Gewitterwolke.{/n} "Ich hatte gedacht, Eure Worte wären mehr wert. Es ist eine Beleidigung, dass Ihr den Prozess erneut unterbrecht."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "Commorragh'ın misafirperverliğine böyle mi yanıt veriyorsun Arebennian?" {n}Arkon, sinirle yumruğunu sıkıyor. Öfkesinin gölgesi, davetsiz Aeldari konuğun üzerinde bir fırtına bulutu gibi dolanıyor.{/n} "Sözlerinin daha fazla değeri olur sanırdım. Mahkemeyi yeniden bölerek bana hakaret ettin."
languages.original_text: "Is this how you treat the hospitality of Commorragh, Arebennian?" {n}The Archon angrily balls his fist, the shadow of his wrath hanging over the Aeldari interloper like a thunder cloud.{/n} "I thought your words were worth more. You insult me by interrupting the trial again."

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh'ın misafirperverliğine böyle mi yanıt veriyorsun Arebennian?" {n}Arkon sinirle yumruğunu sıkıyor. Öfkesinin gölgesi, davetsiz Aeldari misafirin üzerinde bir fırtına bulutu gibi dolanıyor.{/n} "Sözlerinin daha fazla değeri olur sanırdım. Mahkemeyi yeniden bölerek bana hakaret ettin."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect
